ops i have learned to reply hehehe
gnome meeting is compatible with msn or yahoo?
can i see divx films in ubuntu? what program to listen mp3?
yes, and many
how and how?
get codecs from mplayerhq.hu for divx, for mp3 playback there are a ton of programs... beep, xmms, rhythmbox, etc.
check out the wiki at ubuntulinux.com for how to set up mp3 playback
they're not closed, that's just a notice before the main page
none, you just have to try them out to see which you like the most... I use beep media player
I like it
it's a fork of xmms, the perennial favorite linux music player
can u help me to install it? come with me to mplayerhq and tell me what files to download please
can u help me to install it? come with me to mplayerhq and tell me what files to download please
go to the download page and get the "essential codecs package"
you have to extract the files into /usr/local/lib/codecs
i go to usr them to local and to lib but there is no codec folder only i see is forther python 2.3
yes, you have to create it... alternatively, it looks like ubuntuguide.org has instructions on how to get the codecs
